siteIdeas:
Build a one-page “Gallery Showcase” (digital business card) template for designers/artists.

Goal
- Minimal front page that introduces the creator and shows a horizontal image slideshow with a clear contact action (mailto).

Layout
- Header: left = logo or name; right = Contact button (mailto:), plus optional social icons.
- Main: full-width horizontal carousel (swipe, arrows, dots). 5–8 images, 3:2 default ratio, caption toggle.
- Optional “About” blurb under the carousel (1–2 short sentences).
- Footer: small location line and copyright.

Behavior
- Carousel: autoplay (5s), pause on hover/focus, keyboard arrows, swipe on touch, lazy-load next/prev slides.
- Contact button always visible (sticky on mobile).
- Variants: logo centered vs left; captions on/off; light vs dark theme.

Style
- Ultra-clean, generous whitespace, neutral background (#FFFFFF or #0B0B0B for dark).
- Sans-serif display + text scale (H1 48–64, body 16–18), subtle 200–300ms fades.
- High contrast (meets WCAG AA), visible focus rings.

Responsive
- Mobile: single column; carousel edge-to-edge; sticky bottom Contact bar.
- Tablet/Desktop: header inline; carousel max-width 1440px.

Accessibility
- Alt text per image; ARIA roles/labels for carousel; proper tab order.

SEO & Meta
- Editable page title, meta description, Open Graph/Twitter image (first slide), favicon.
- JSON-LD Person/Organization schema.

Performance
- Serve images as WebP/AVIF with sizes/srcset; defer scripts; prefetch next slide; target LCP < 2.5s.

Content schema (variables)
- site.title (string)
- site.logo (image)
- contact.email (string)
- contact.socials[] ({label,url})
- gallery.slides[] ({src, alt, caption?})
- about.text (string)
- theme.mode (“light” | “dark”)
- theme.accent (hex)

Example content
- title: “Your Name — Designer”
- email: “you@domain.com”
- socials: [{label:“Instagram”,url:“https://…”}]
- slides: [
  {src:“image1.webp”, alt:“Project A overview”, caption:“Project A, 2025”},
  {src:“image2.webp”, alt:“Detail view”}
]
- about: “Designer working across objects, spaces, and film.”

Deliverable
- One template with the above schema and variants; ready to duplicate and fill.
